column1: The Hegang–Dalian Expressway (Chinese: 鹤岗—大连高速公路)
column2: commonly referred to as the Heda Expressway (Chinese: 鹤大高速公路) is an expressway that connects the cities of Hegang
column8: 390 km (860 mi) in length. The expressway runs parallel to G201 Road for all its length.

column1: The expressway has not been fully constructed. Only two sections of the expressway are complete:

column2: from Dandong to the southern terminus
